channel.title: Microsoft Office 2003 Professional - No Serial Needed!
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt][b]Microsoft Office Professional 2003[/size][/center] [center][size=11pt] [b]Service Pack 2 Integrated[/b][/size][/center]
[b]Compressed Size= 268 MB Uncompressed Size= 641 MB[/b]
Description:
Office 2003 Editions can help organizations and their employees transform information into impact. New and familiar products, features, and functionality improve how people and organizations connect to coworkers, information, and business processes.
Advances in intranet collaboration through integration with the collaboration and information-sharing portal, Microsoft Office SharePoint Portal Server 2003, enable employees to access and share information both internally and externally. Support for information rights management (IRM) and industry-standard Extensible Markup Language (XML) provide a platform on which to quickly build cost-effective solutions that can have an immediate impact.
*******************************************************************************************
Includes:
[b]Word 2003 Excel 2003 PowerPoint 2003 Outlook 2003 Publisher 2003 Access 2003 InfoPath 2003[/b]
*******************************************************************************************
Instructions:
[b]1. Download [url=http://d01.megashares.com/?d01=f5d6a4f][size=11pt]here[/size][/url] 2. Extract with WinRAR (Password is z4z) 3. Install 4. Enjoy!![/b]
Your Friend, Leader

item.title: Microsoft Office 2003 Professional - No Serial Needed!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:5, topic:16169”] Rule 10. DO NOT post or upload any copyrighted materials, ie deobs, clients or any other sort (however if you were to link to a file that was uploaded somewhere else or post code in the pasteBin, well, I would have no control over that right?

I wouldn’t do anything that would get Mopar into trouble. He is a good friend.[/quote]

You missed the most important part of the rule:

Rule 10. DO NOT post or upload any copyrighted materials, ie deobs, clients or any other sort [u][b](however if you were to link to a file that was uploaded somewhere else or post code in the pasteBin, well, I would have no control over that right?)[/b][/u]

Read full topic

Compressed Size= 268 MB
Uncompressed Size= 641 MB

Description:

Office 2003 Editions can help organizations and their employees transform information into impact. New and familiar products, features, and functionality improve how people and organizations connect to coworkers, information, and business processes.

Advances in intranet collaboration through integration with the collaboration and information-sharing portal, Microsoft Office SharePoint Portal Server 2003, enable employees to access and share information both internally and externally. Support for information rights management (IRM) and industry-standard Extensible Markup Language (XML) provide a platform on which to quickly build cost-effective solutions that can have an immediate impact.

Includes:

Word 2003
Excel 2003
PowerPoint 2003
Outlook 2003
Publisher 2003
Access 2003
InfoPath 2003
